text:
—
Updated at my behest: <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3909/1>
Thank you Ry.
I’m going to merge <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3905> (confirmed & approved by Greg) unless there’s an objection here :wink:

I was just trying to be extra-prudent when updating that file, as it is the first time we do this… I think it’s fine. Just being realistic. (If one maintainer approves the change of his personal email, etc. is not as if we are adding a new one ;-)).
Oh, wait, Greg, was that you really you? Or were your credentials simply stolen?! Had we only had ECerts!
I suppose all maintainers could submit gpg-signed changes for updates to that file
heh, gpg sigs are not a bad idea in general
